content:
Subject: Action Required: Order Confirmation from TechNest Solutions
From: support@technest-info.com
To: user@example.com

Dear Customer,

We noticed an issue with your recent order confirmation at TechNest Solutions and require you to verify your information.

Please follow the link below to confirm your details:

- Verify Now (http://malicious-link.technest.com/verify)

If you do not verify, your account may experience interruptions.

Thank you,
TechNest Solutions Support Team
support@technest-info.com
